name: Ext_R4B_NutritionOrder_en_additiveType
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.additiveType for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.additiveType from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/NutritionOrder|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Type of modular component to add to the feeding
element.definition: Indicates the type of modular component such as protein, carbohydrate, fat or fiber to be provided in addition to or mixed with the base formula.
element.comment: `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.additiveType` has no related element in R5:NutritionOrder

element.short: Type of modular component to add to the feeding
element.definition: Indicates the type of modular component such as protein, carbohydrate, fat or fiber to be provided in addition to or mixed with the base formula.
element.comment: `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.additiveType` has no related element in R5:NutritionOrder

binding.description: Codes for the type of modular component such as protein, carbohydrate or fiber to be provided in addition to or mixed with the base formula.
